intent_atoms.description: Provide a shared ParseIssueStore aggregate that records tolerant parsing issues and exposes metrics to downstream observers
Allow node and byte range queries on stored parsing issues
Make the ParseIssueStore available through ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment and ParseTreeStore for CLI and SwiftUI clients
ParseIssueStore must publish issue collections via @Published
Metrics tracking must be implemented and exposed
Main‑thread coordination is required to ensure safe reuse across Combine and CLI workflows
StreamingBoxWalker must supply depth values for each issue
The ParsePipeline.Context must be the one ..??

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore Aggregate
functional_units.description: Records tolerant parsing issues, supports node/byte range queries, and publishes real-time metrics for downstream observers.

functional_units.name: StreamingBoxWalker Depth-aware Issue Emission
functional_units.description: Supplies depth values when emitting issues to enable store to calculate deepest affected depth without re-traversal.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Context Integration
functional_units.description: Propagates an optional ParseIssueStore, resets it before runs and records issues as they stream in.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment Exposure
functional_units.description: Exposes the ParseIssueStore through CLI environment for commands to access shared metrics.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStore Exposure
functional_units.description: Provides SwiftUI state with access to shared metrics via ParseTreeStore.
